name: firebasedynamiclinks
title: Firebase Dynamic Links API
description: Firebase Dynamic Links API enables third party developers to programmatically create and manage Dynamic Links.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.desc: Selector specifying which fields to include in a partial response.

enum.desc: v1 error format
v2 error format

enum.name: json
enum.desc: Responses with Content-Type of application/json

enum.name: media
enum.desc: Media download with context-dependent Content-Type

enum.name: proto
enum.desc: Responses with Content-Type of application/x-protobuf

parameters.name: oauth_token
parameters.desc: OAuth 2.0 token for the current user.

parameters.name: key
parameters.desc: API key. Your API key identifies your project and provides you with API access, quota, and reports. Required unless you provide an OAuth 2.0 token.

parameters.name: prettyPrint
parameters.desc: Returns response with indentations and line breaks.

parameters.name: quotaUser
parameters.desc: Available to use for quota purposes for server-side applications. Can be any arbitrary string assigned to a user, but should not exceed 40 characters.

schemas.name: ITunesConnectAnalytics
schemas.desc: Parameters for iTunes Connect App Analytics.

fields.name: at
fields.desc: Affiliate token used to create affiliate-coded links.

fields.name: ct
fields.desc:
Campaign text that developers can optionally add to any link in order to
track sales from a specific marketing campaign.

fields.name: mt
fields.desc: iTune media types, including music, podcasts, audiobooks and so on.

fields.name: pt
fields.desc:
Provider token that enables analytics for Dynamic Links from within iTunes
Connect.

schemas.name: AndroidInfo
schemas.desc: Android related attributes to the Dynamic Link.

fields.name: androidLink
fields.desc: If specified, this overrides the ‘link’ parameter on Android.

fields.name: androidFallbackLink
fields.desc: Link to open on Android if the app is not installed.

fields.name: androidPackageName
fields.desc: Android package name of the app.

fields.name: androidMinPackageVersionCode
fields.desc:
Minimum version code for the Android app. If the installed app’s version
code is lower, then the user is taken to the Play Store.

fields.name: enableForcedRedirect
fields.desc:
If this option is on, FDL click will be forced to redirect rather than
show an interstitial page.

schemas.name: IosInfo
schemas.desc: iOS related attributes to the Dynamic Link..

fields.name: iosAppStoreId
fields.desc: iOS App Store ID.

fields.name: iosIpadFallbackLink
fields.desc: If specified, this overrides the ios_fallback_link value on iPads.

fields.name: iosIpadBundleId
fields.desc: iPad bundle ID of the app.

fields.name: iosCustomScheme
fields.desc:
Custom (destination) scheme to use for iOS. By default, we’ll use the
bundle ID as the custom scheme. Developer can override this behavior using
this param.

fields.name: iosBundleId
fields.desc: iOS bundle ID of the app.

fields.name: iosFallbackLink
fields.desc: Link to open on iOS if the app is not installed.

schemas.name: CreateShortDynamicLinkResponse
schemas.desc: Response to create a short Dynamic Link.

fields.name: previewLink
fields.desc: Preivew link to show the link flow chart.

fields.name: warning
fields.desc: Information about potential warnings on link creation.

fields.name: shortLink
fields.desc: Short Dynamic Link value. e.g. https://abcd.app.goo.gl/wxyz

fields.name: option
fields.desc: Suffix option.

enum.name: OPTION_UNSPECIFIED
enum.desc: The suffix option is not specified, performs as NOT_GUESSABLE .

enum.name: UNGUESSABLE
enum.desc:
Short Dynamic Link suffix is a base62 [0-9A-Za-z] encoded string of
a random generated 96 bit random number, which has a length of 17 chars.
For example, "nlAR8U4SlKRZw1cb2".
It prevents other people from guessing and crawling short Dynamic Links
that contain personal identifiable information.

enum.name: SHORT
enum.desc:
Short Dynamic Link suffix is a base62 [0-9A-Za-z] string starting with a
length of 4 chars. the length will increase when all the space is
occupied.

fields.name: socialMetaTagInfo
fields.desc:
Parameters for social meta tag params.
Used to set meta tag data for link previews on social sites.

fields.name: androidInfo
fields.desc:
Android related information. See Android related parameters in the
[documentation](https://firebase.google.com/docs/dynamic-links/android#create-a-dynamic-link-programmatically).

fields.name: navigationInfo
fields.desc: Information of navigation behavior of a Firebase Dynamic Links.

fields.name: analyticsInfo
fields.desc:
Parameters used for tracking. See all tracking parameters in the
[documentation](https://firebase.google.com/docs/dynamic-links/android#create-a-dynamic-link-programmatically).

fields.name: dynamicLinkDomain
fields.desc:
Dynamic Links domain that the project owns, e.g. abcd.app.goo.gl
[Learn more](https://firebase.google.com/docs/dynamic-links/android#set-up-firebase-and-the-dynamic-links-sdk)
on how to set up Dynamic Link domain associated with your Firebase project.

Required.

fields.name: link
fields.desc:
The link your app will open, You can specify any URL your app can handle.
This link must be a well-formatted URL, be properly URL-encoded, and use
the HTTP or HTTPS scheme. See 'link' parameters in the
[documentation](https://firebase.google.com/docs/dynamic-links/android#create-a-dynamic-link-programmatically).

Required.

fields.name: iosInfo
fields.desc:
iOS related information. See iOS related parameters in the
[documentation](https://firebase.google.com/docs/dynamic-links/ios#create-a-dynamic-link-programmatically).

schemas.name: AnalyticsInfo
schemas.desc: Tracking parameters supported by Dynamic Link.

fields.name: itunesConnectAnalytics
fields.desc: iTunes Connect App Analytics.

fields.name: googlePlayAnalytics
fields.desc: Google Play Campaign Measurements.

schemas.name: CreateShortDynamicLinkRequest
schemas.desc: Request to create a short Dynamic Link.

fields.name: suffix
fields.desc: Short Dynamic Link suffix. Optional.

fields.name: dynamicLinkInfo
fields.desc:
Information about the Dynamic Link to be shortened.
[Learn more](https://firebase.google.com/docs/dynamic-links/android#create-a-dynamic-link-programmatically).

fields.name: longDynamicLink
fields.desc:
Full long Dynamic Link URL with desired query parameters specified.
For example,
"https://sample.app.goo.gl/?link=http://www.google.com&apn=com.sample",
[Learn more](https://firebase.google.com/docs/dynamic-links/android#create-a-dynamic-link-programmatically).

schemas.name: GooglePlayAnalytics
schemas.desc:
Parameters for Google Play Campaign Measurements.
[Learn more](https://developers.google.com/analytics/devguides/collection/android/v4/campaigns#campaign-params)

fields.name: utmCampaign
fields.desc:
Campaign name; used for keyword analysis to identify a specific product
promotion or strategic campaign.

fields.name: gclid
utmContent
fields.desc:
Campaign content; used for A/B testing and content-targeted ads to
differentiate ads or links that point to the same URL.

fields.name: utmMedium
fields.desc: Campaign medium; used to identify a medium such as email or cost-per-click.

fields.name: utmTerm
fields.desc: Campaign term; used with paid search to supply the keywords for ads.

fields.name: utmSource
fields.desc:
Campaign source; used to identify a search engine, newsletter, or other
source.

schemas.name: SocialMetaTagInfo
schemas.desc:
Parameters for social meta tag params.
Used to set meta tag data for link previews on social sites.

fields.name: socialTitle
fields.desc: Title to be displayed. Optional.

fields.name: socialImageLink
fields.desc: An image url string. Optional.

fields.name: socialDescription
fields.desc: A short description of the link. Optional.

fields.name: warningMessage
fields.desc: The warning message to help developers improve their requests.

fields.name: warningCode
fields.desc: The warning code.

enum.name: CODE_UNSPECIFIED
enum.desc: Unknown code.

enum.name: NOT_IN_PROJECT_ANDROID_PACKAGE_NAME
enum.desc: The Android package does not match any in developer's DevConsole project.

enum.name: NOT_INTEGER_ANDROID_PACKAGE_MIN_VERSION
enum.desc: The Android minimum version code has to be a valid integer.

enum.name: UNNECESSARY_ANDROID_PACKAGE_MIN_VERSION
enum.desc:
Android package min version param is not needed, e.g. when
'apn' is missing.

enum.name: NOT_URI_ANDROID_LINK
enum.desc: Android link is not a valid URI.

enum.name: UNNECESSARY_ANDROID_LINK
enum.desc:
Android link param is not needed, e.g. when param 'al' and 'link' have
the same value..

enum.name: NOT_URI_ANDROID_FALLBACK_LINK
enum.desc: Android fallback link is not a valid URI.

enum.name: BAD_URI_SCHEME_ANDROID_FALLBACK_LINK
enum.desc: Android fallback link has an invalid (non http/https) URI scheme.

enum.name: NOT_IN_PROJECT_IOS_BUNDLE_ID
enum.desc: The iOS bundle ID does not match any in developer's DevConsole project.

enum.name: NOT_IN_PROJECT_IPAD_BUNDLE_ID
enum.desc: The iPad bundle ID does not match any in developer's DevConsole project.

enum.name: UNNECESSARY_IOS_URL_SCHEME
enum.desc: iOS URL scheme is not needed, e.g. when 'ibi' are 'ipbi' are all missing.

enum.name: NOT_NUMERIC_IOS_APP_STORE_ID
enum.desc: iOS app store ID format is incorrect, e.g. not numeric.

enum.name: UNNECESSARY_IOS_APP_STORE_ID
enum.desc: iOS app store ID is not needed.

enum.name: NOT_URI_IOS_FALLBACK_LINK
enum.desc: iOS fallback link is not a valid URI.

enum.name: BAD_URI_SCHEME_IOS_FALLBACK_LINK
enum.desc: iOS fallback link has an invalid (non http/https) URI scheme.

enum.name: NOT_URI_IPAD_FALLBACK_LINK
enum.desc: iPad fallback link is not a valid URI.

enum.name: BAD_URI_SCHEME_IPAD_FALLBACK_LINK
enum.desc: iPad fallback link has an invalid (non http/https) URI scheme.

enum.name: BAD_DEBUG_PARAM
enum.desc: Debug param format is incorrect.

enum.name: BAD_AD_PARAM
enum.desc: isAd param format is incorrect.

enum.name: DEPRECATED_PARAM
enum.desc: Indicates a certain param is deprecated.

enum.name: UNRECOGNIZED_PARAM
enum.desc: Indicates certain paramater is not recognized.

enum.name: TOO_LONG_PARAM
enum.desc: Indicates certain paramater is too long.

enum.name: NOT_URI_SOCIAL_IMAGE_LINK
enum.desc: Social meta tag image link is not a valid URI.

enum.name: BAD_URI_SCHEME_SOCIAL_IMAGE_LINK
enum.desc: Social meta tag image link has an invalid (non http/https) URI scheme.

enum.name: LINK_LENGTH_TOO_LONG
enum.desc: Dynamic Link URL length is too long.

enum.name: LINK_WITH_FRAGMENTS
enum.desc: Dynamic Link URL contains fragments.

enum.name: NOT_MATCHING_IOS_BUNDLE_ID_AND_STORE_ID
enum.desc: The iOS bundle ID does not match with the given iOS store ID.

methods.name: create
methods.desc:
Creates a short Dynamic Link given either a valid long Dynamic Link or
details such as Dynamic Link domain, Android and iOS app information.
The created short Dynamic Link will not expire.

Repeated calls with the same long Dynamic Link or Dynamic Link information
will produce the same short Dynamic Link.

The Dynamic Link domain in the request must be owned by requester's
Firebase project.
